body_html:
@dacox Thanks for the script and logs!

I ran your code on Mac and Ubuntu and I didn't see any slowness between the cold-start run and warm-start run. I ran the code on CPU only. Can you disable GPU for your runs and confirm that you don't see any slowness when everything runs on CPU only?

body:
@dacox Thanks for the script and logs!

I ran your code on Mac and Ubuntu and I didn't see any slowness between the cold-start run and warm-start run. I ran the code on CPU only. Can you disable GPU for your runs and confirm that you don't see any slowness when everything runs on CPU only?
